Home » 40P21 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
27 Hetuduka, Parittattika
Hetuduka, Parittattika
74.
177Nahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
178Nahetuṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
179Nahetuṃ naappamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
